TestCase.name: testEnableByParameters
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0_RETRACT(sum0$0) AS $f0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0_RETRACT($f1_0) AS sum0$0, COUNT_RETRACT(*) AS count$1]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f1], select=[$f1, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS $f1_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, MOD(HASH_CODE(c), 256) AS $f1], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testEnableMicroBatch
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecMicroBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testEnableMiniBatch
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testEnablePartialAgg
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0_RETRACT(sum0$0) AS $f0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(select=[$SUM0_RETRACT($f1_0) AS sum0$0, COUNT_RETRACT(*) AS count$1]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[$f1], select=[$f1, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS $f1_0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[$f1]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[c, MOD(HASH_CODE(c), 256) AS $f1], outputBinaryRow=[true]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
